"Properties" {
	"Authors" "Areng"
	"Description" 
	{
	"" "A pedestal button that when pressed or given an input, switches the portal gun from mono to dual. The mono portal device can only shoot blue portals but the orange portal does not get fizzled when the player passes a fizzler with it."
	"" ""
	"" "Passing through an absolute fizzler always fizzles both portals whether the player has the mono or dual portal device."
	"" ""
	"" "* __Start Enabled__ to have the player start with the dual portal device."
